Entries.Mon: Have I told you {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} and I are sisters? Strange, isn't it?
Entries.Mon6: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} would get a job or at least contribute to cooking and cleaning.$s#$e#I think she's hoping to marry someone rich.$u
Entries.Mon6_inlaw_Haley: I have to say, now that {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}'s gone I've had a much easier time keeping things in order.
Entries.Tue: I work part-time at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}' saloon. It pays the bills.
Entries.Tue4: I'm just working at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}' to make ends meet... but my real passion is tailoring.$u#$e#I made these clothes from scratch, see?
Entries.summer_Mon: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} is a picky eater. It's so hard to cook for her.
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Haley: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} and I get along much better now that she's moved out. I look forward to her visits!
Entries.summer_Tue6: I feel bad for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}. People judge {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}'s just living a different lifestyle.$u#$e#I wish everyone could learn to be accepting of others.
Entries.summer_Fri: If I wasn't so busy I'd come help you on the farm!#$e#But {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} would be upset if I had another job...$s
Entries.summer_Fri6: You know, I'm sure {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} would understand if I wanted to leave the Saloon someday.#$b#There's so much out there, I can't stay a barmaid forever.$u
Entries.summer_Sat: Don't overwork yourself or you might end up in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}'s clinic!
Entries.fall_Thu: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}}'s a nice {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}}, if you get to know {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}}.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} gets lonely working in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} shop all day. But {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}}'s so shy {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} has trouble making new friends.
Entries.fall_Thu8: I think {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s mad at me. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintGender}}}} never looks at me anymore...$u#$e#I always thought we were friends.$u
Entries.winter_Wed: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.#$e#Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy.$h
Entries.winter_Thu: It must be so cold for the poor fish.$s#$e#I wonder if any fish hibernate? Maybe I should ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}.

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} seems to have problems organizing everything without me around.

BeforeMovie.Text: I usually go to more positive movies, so this will be interesting.

DuringMovie.Text: Yoba, please protect me from the dark energy of this movie.$7

AfterMovie.Text: My energy levels are low after that one...$3
